hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y git flex bison gcc gcc-c++ make perl-Test-Simple.noarch sudo zypper install -y openssl wget tar libqt4-devel libxml2-devel ghostscript texlive* unzip sudo zypper install -y graphviz python-xml libxml2-tools perl perl-YAML zip
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
sudo cpan Test::More sudo cpan File::Path
#wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/multirow/multirow.sty wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/multirow/multirow.dtx wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/multirow/multirow.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/multirow/multirow.pdf latex multirow.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/import/import.sty wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/xtab/xtab.dtx wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/xtab/xtab.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/xtab/xtab.pdf latex xtab.ins
wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/sectsty/sectsty.dtx wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/sectsty/sectsty.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/sectsty/sectsty.pdf latex sectsty.ins
wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tocloft/tocloft.dtx wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tocloft/tocloft.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tocloft/tocloft.pdf latex tocloft.ins
wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/appendix.zip unzip appendix.zip cd appendix latex appendix.ins mv appendix.sty ../ cd ..
#wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/appendix/appendix.dtx #wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/appendix/appendix.ins #wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/appendix/appendix.pdf #latex appendix.ins
wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tabu/tabu.dtx wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tabu/tabu.ins wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/macros/latex/contrib/tabu/tabu.pdf latex tabu.ins
#wget http://mirrors.ctan.org/support/epstopdf/epstopdf.pl wget http://tug.ctan.org/tex-archive/support/epstopdf/epstopdf.pl sudo mv epstopdf.pl /usr/local/bin/epstopdf chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/epstopdf
sudo cp *.sty /usr/share/texmf/tex/latex/ sudo mktexlsr
git clone https://github.com/doxygen/doxygen.git cd doxygen git checkout Release_1_8_11
rm -rf build mkdir build cd build
wget http://www.cmake.org/files/v2.8/cmake-2.8.12.1.tar.gz --no-check-certificate gzip -d cmake-2.8.12.1.tar.gz tar xvf cmake-2.8.12.1.tar cd cmake-2.8.12.1 ./configure --prefix=/cmake-2.8.12.1/cmake make sudo make install
cd .. cmake-2.8.12.1/bin/cmake -G "Unix Makefiles" -Dbuild_doc=ON -Dbuild_wizard=YES .. make make docs sudo make install make tests
doxygen -v if [[ $? -gt 0 ]] then exit 1 fi
